Title: Successful checkout
Description: User completes checkout with valid data
Steps:
1. Proceed to checkout
2. Enter shipping and payment details
3. Submit order
Expected Result: Order confirmation with order number shown

Title: Invalid payment info
Steps:
1. Proceed to checkout
2. Enter invalid payment info
3. Submit order

Title: Empty shipping address
Steps:
1. Proceed to checkout
2. Leave shipping address empty
3. Submit order
